author: Premium Times
title: Alleged Contempt: EFCC wins case against Yahaya Bello at appeal court
text: EFCC’s appeal against the Kogi State High Court ruling favouring former Governor Yahaya Bello succeeded on Thursday, paving the way for the EFCC to proceed with his trial.

author: 网易
title: 凌晨轰炸，俄军8架图-95轰炸机出击，英国上校：核爆将逼乌军投降|基辅|乌克兰|战略轰炸机_网易订阅
text:
本文严格依据权威信源（官媒占比超80%），结合最新动态及历史数据，最终观点保持中立。结尾附有参考资料。
前言
基辅防空警报长鸣五小时，夜空被导弹尾焰切割成碎片。
八架图-95MS战略轰炸机从萨拉托夫州基地起飞 ，向乌克兰腹地倾泻上百枚导弹——这是2025年6月6日凌晨，俄罗斯对乌克兰“蛛网行动”的复仇之火。
俄罗斯国防部通报简洁冷酷：为回应基辅政权的“恐怖主义行径”，俄军使用高精度武器对乌军装备生产厂、无人机装配点和军事仓库实施了“大规模袭击”。
基辅、利沃夫、第聂伯罗等多地同时遇袭，爆炸震波撼动着乌克兰已千疮百孔的防御体系。 耐人寻味的是，空袭前特朗普与普京进行了1小时15分钟通话。
美方事后声明中既无警告也无劝阻，仿佛默许了这场报复。
当英国退役上校理查德·肯普抛出“战术核打击可能迫降乌军”的惊悚预测时，欧洲大陆的夏夜骤然降至冰点。
基辅高层的最后通牒
俄军此次轰炸绝非例行公事。俄罗斯媒体“沙皇堡”直接将此称为“泽连斯基的死刑执行令”——这个充满血腥味的标题，折射出克里姆林宫的战略转向。
普京不再满足于前线拉锯，而是将矛头直指乌克兰决策中枢。
导火索是五天前的“蛛网行动”。乌克兰无人机突袭俄战略轰炸机基地，宣称摧毁41架图-95和图-22M3。
尽管俄方承认的损失数字低得多，但卫星图像显示多架战略轰炸机确实严重损毁。
更让莫斯科震怒的是，乌方同步袭击了克里米亚大桥和库尔斯克民用设施，触碰了普京划定的红线。
报复目标清单精确得令人窒息：总统府、国防部大楼、安全局总部。俄方甚至特意强调将在白天实施打击，让建筑坍塌与人员伤亡毫无遮掩地展示于世界。
这种赤裸裸的威慑，意图摧毁的不仅是建筑物，更是乌克兰的指挥链与国家意志。
图-95MS为何成主力
八架图-95MS集体出击的场景颇为罕见。
这种螺旋桨战略轰炸机看似老迈，实则是俄军最可靠的远程打击平台。 在俄空天军序列中，现役图-95MS约60架，远多于仅17架的图-160。
数量优势与维护便捷性使其成为报复行动的首选。
耐人寻味的是，乌军“蛛网行动”中，一架图-160停在遭袭图-95仅200米处却完好无损。
军事专家分析：乌军使用的民用改装无人机仅能携带小型炸弹，优先选择满载燃油的图-95攻击能造成更大破坏。
更深层的原因是——图-95MS出勤率极高，承担了俄军九成以上的巡航导弹发射任务，打掉它才能真正削弱俄军战略打击能力。
爱国者导弹的最后防线
基辅防空警报持续五小时，暴露了乌克兰防空体系的脆弱现状。
6月5日，俄军伊斯坎德尔导弹精确摧毁德国援助的IRIS-T防空系统及TRML-4D雷达，现场数名德国工程兵丧生。
至此，乌军爱国者系统仅剩4个发射架，欧洲军援已近枯竭 。
一旦防空网彻底崩溃，战场将呈现灾难性连锁反应：俄军苏-34战斗轰炸机可长驱直入，向基辅、哈尔科夫等要地投掷FAB-1500等巨型滑翔炸弹。
这种单枚重达1.5吨的精确制导武器，破坏力远超伊朗“小摩托”无人机。届时乌克兰的天空，将真正成为俄空天军的训练场。
核爆逼降论
当英国退役上校理查德·肯普抛出“核爆逼降论”时，欧洲各国防长办公室的电话彻夜未歇。
他判断普京最恐惧被视作软弱，可能授权使用当量几百至几千吨的战术核弹——这种武器在军事术语中被称为“大号的重磅炸弹”。
潜在打击目标直指乌军命脉：44个空军基地内的F-16与幻影-2000战机、第聂伯河上24座钢铁桥梁、基辅总统府及敖德萨港。
对莫斯科而言，战术核爆既能瞬间瘫痪乌战力，又可规避全面核战争风险——毕竟其当量远小于广岛原子弹的1.5万吨。
但风险在于不可控的连锁反应。俄军已在加里宁格勒部署“匕首”高超音速导弹，9分钟即可覆盖柏林。
一旦核阴云升起，北约是否还能保持克制？答案恐怕连特朗普都不敢断言。
最令基辅心寒的，或许是西方的悄然退却。
特朗普与普京通话后，白宫声明仅表示“美国与袭击无关”，对俄报复行动未置一词。
德国虽宣布50亿欧元新军援，但总理默茨私下向内阁坦承“拥有核武器的俄罗斯不可战胜”——递刀的手已在颤抖。
战场上的欧洲身影正被快速清除：敖德萨的法国雇佣兵刚下运输机就遭“小摩托”无人机群覆盖；波兰悄悄撤回导弹操作教官；连斯洛伐克援助的Wolf 25 AD装甲车都标榜为“测试装备”。
从常规报复到核恫吓
俄军此次轰炸埋下了更危险的伏笔。
莫斯科通过打击德国IRIS-T与法国雇佣兵营地，向欧洲传递明确信号：支援乌克兰等于自动成为打击目标。
这种威慑正在生效——荷兰4亿欧元援助包裹里只有扫雷舰，比利时承诺的“十年援助”更像是外交辞令。
英国上校的核威胁预测虽耸人听闻，却折射出残酷现实：当常规手段无法扭转战局，弱势方易陷入战术冒险，强势方则可能选择终极威慑。
普京的决策天平上，一边是国内高涨的民族主义情绪，另一边是持续失血的国力。当特朗普在通话中只关心“阻止伊朗拥核”，乌克兰的命运已被贴上价签。
基辅独立大街的咖啡馆里，侍者习惯性地擦着杯子，窗外防空警报已停歇五小时。
他不知道俄军作战室里，“匕首”导弹的目标参数锁定在总统府地下掩体； 也不知道伦敦军情六处的报告用红笔圈出“战术核武器部署征兆”。
敖德萨港的残骸冒着青烟，法国雇佣兵的遗体正装袋运离。
而在萨拉托夫空军基地，地勤人员给图-95MS挂载新一轮Kh-101巡航导弹——弹舱金属碰撞声在夜色中格外清脆。
英国上校肯普的预测在加密通讯频道流传， 但真正决定战局走向的，或许是布鲁塞尔会议室里那声疲惫的叹息：“我们真要继续填这个无底洞吗？”
历史从不偏爱炮火最响的一方。
当第聂伯河畔的向日葵又被硝烟熏黑，真正的赢家早已在能源管道与芯片工厂里写下姓名。
参考信源：《几乎覆盖乌克兰全境！俄大举轰炸乌军工企业回应“蛛网”行动》2025-06-06 19:30·川观新闻
声明：个人原创，仅供参考

author: Agence France-Presse
title: Sombre Christmas Eve in Bethlehem as Gaza war rages
text:
Sombre Christmas Eve in Bethlehem as Gaza war rages
A crucifix is raised as deacons and other clergymen congregate for Christmas Eve celebrations (according to Western tradition) outside the Church of the Nativity in the biblical city of Bethlehem in the occupied West Bank on 24 December. Photo by HAZEM BADER / AFP
A pall of gloom descended over Bethlehem on Christmas Eve as the Gaza war weighed heavily on the biblical city in the occupied West Bank and the usual crowds of pilgrims stayed away.
The traditional giant Christmas tree, marching bands and flamboyant nativity scene were all absent in the city celebrated as the birthplace of Jesus Christ.
While there were few festive lights, a huge Palestinian flag was unfolded in the centre of town and a banner declared that “The bells of Bethlehem ring for a ceasefire in Gaza”.
Bethlehem usually throngs with pilgrims and tourists at this time of year. But many residents have fled and few visitors have come since the start of the Israel-Hamas war on October 7.
The bloody conflict was sparked when the Palestinian militants launched a deadly cross border attack on southern Israel, triggering a massive Israeli retaliation.
Palestinian Christians showed little appetite for celebration, with official events largely cancelled by the municipality.
Many in the community were unable to come to terms with the death and displacement of hundreds of thousands of their fellow Palestinians in the Gaza Strip.
“A lot of people are dying for this land,” said Nicole Najjar, an 18-year-old student. “It’s really hard to celebrate while our people are dying.”
Usually a huge Christmas tree is put up at Bethlehem’s Church of the Nativity, believed by Christians to be built on the spot where Christ was born.
This year there is an art installation expressing solidarity with Gazans: grey statues of Mary and Joseph placed in a pile of rubble.
On the building next door hung a large banner that read: “Stop the genocide, stop the displacement, lift the blockade” on Gaza.
‘Sorrow, loss’
The Hamas attack on October 7 left around 1,140 people dead in Israel, most of them civilians, according to an AFP tally based on the latest official Israeli figures.
The Palestinian militants also abducted around 250 people, 129 of whom Israel says remain in Gaza.
Vowing to destroy Hamas, Israel launched a relentless bombardment and ground invasion of Gaza, where 20,424 people have been killed, mostly women and children, according to the latest toll from the territory’s health ministry.
“This year is different,” said Mervat Murra, 50, a fashion designer in Bethlehem. “It is marked by sadness, sorrow, destruction, deprivation and loss.”
A marching band, which usually comes with loud bagpipes and tambourines, was absent this year.
“Our message every year for Christmas is a message of peace and love but this year it is message of sadness, grief and anger — a message as a response to what is happening in the Gaza Strip,” said Bethlehem’s Mayor Hanna Hanania.
“The deaf international community must hear our voice.”
Speaking as he arrived at the Church of the Nativity, the Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem, Pierbattista Pizzaballa, said: “We are here to pray and to ask not only for a ceasefire, a ceasefire is not enough.
“We have to stop theses hostilities and to turn the page because violence generates only violence.”
Wearing a black and white keffiyeh, he called for unity among Palestinians of all faiths.
‘We cry’
Church leaders in Jerusalem and the Bethlehem city council took the decision last month to forego “any unnecessarily festive” Christmas celebrations, in solidarity with Gazans.
The West Bank itself has also seen escalating violence since the start of the war, with more than 300 Palestinians killed by Israeli forces or settlers, local health officials say.
“We have no taste for celebrations” during the war, said Mitri Raheb, a pastor from the Gaza Strip.
He added that in the West Bank, too, every day “we cry for young people killed by the Israelis”.
The West Bank has been occupied by Israel since the 1967 Arab-Israeli War.
“All we want for Christmas right now is a ceasefire, a sustainable ceasefire to stop this atrocity,” said Raheb.
“Bethlehem gave Jesus to the world and it’s high time for the world to give Bethlehem and Gaza peace.”

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: Introducing the NCS eDSD Suite: Revolutionizing Direct Store Delivery (DSD) Software for Seamless Operations | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: NCS Solutions, a leader in innovative software solutions, proudly announces the launch of the NCS eDSD Suite, a comprehensive solution designed to transform the landscape of the Direct Store Delivery (DSD) industry. This cutting-edge software suite addresses the unique requirements of both back-office operations and mobile workers, providing a seamless and efficient solution for businesses involved in direct store delivery. The NCS eDSD Suite is a result of extensive research and development, driven by a commitment to meeting the evolving needs of the DSD industry. With a user-friendly interface and powerful features, the suite empowers businesses to streamline their operations, enhance productivity, and stay ahead in a competitive market. Key Features of the NCS eDSD Suite: Comprehensive Back-Office Management: - The suite includes robust back-office management tools that enable businesses to optimize their internal processes. From inventory management and order processing to invoicing and reporting, the NCS eDSD Suite offers a centralized platform for efficient back-office operations. Mobile Workforce Empowerment: - Designed with the mobile worker in mind, the suite provides a user-friendly mobile application that facilitates seamless communication between field representatives and the back office. This empowers mobile workers to manage orders, update inventory, and complete transactions in real-time, ensuring accuracy and efficiency on the go. Real-Time Data Sync: - The NCS eDSD Suite ensures that data is synchronized in real-time between the back office and mobile devices. This not only reduces the risk of errors but also provides decision-makers with up-to-the-minute insights into their business, enabling proactive decision-making. Customizable Solutions: - Recognizing that every business has unique needs, the NCS eDSD Suite is highly customizable. Businesses can tailor the software to fit their specific requirements, ensuring a personalized solution that aligns with their workflow and goals. Scalability for Growth: - As businesses grow, the NCS eDSD Suite grows with them. The scalable architecture allows companies to easily expand their operations without the need for significant software modifications. This ensures that the software remains a valuable asset as businesses evolve and adapt to changing market dynamics. CEO of NCS Solutions, expressed excitement about the launch, stating, "The NCS eDSD Suite represents a significant leap forward in the DSD software landscape. We believe that businesses should have access to a solution that not only meets their current needs but also grows with them. This suite is a testament to our commitment to innovation and empowering businesses to thrive in an ever-changing environment." The NCS eDSD Suite is now available for businesses looking to enhance their direct store delivery operations. For more information, visit https://ncssuite.com/direct-store-delivery-platform/ About NCS Solutions: NCS Solutions is a leading provider of innovative software solutions, committed to empowering businesses with cutting-edge technologies. With a focus on delivering user-friendly and scalable solutions, NCS Solutions aims to drive efficiency and productivity across various industries. Media Contact Company Name: Numeric Computer Systems Contact Person: Mark Hochberg Email: Send Email Phone: +1(631)4869000 Country: United States Website: https://ncssuite.com/direct-store-delivery-platform
